text: Mikhail Afanasyevich Shakhov (; 20 November 1931 – 8 August 2018) was a Soviet bantamweight freestyle wrestler.Mykhailo Shakhov . sports-reference.com He competed at the 1956 and the 1960 Summer Olympics and won a bronze medal in 1956. Shakhov was born in Saratov Oblast, Russia.Михаил Шахов: «Удивляет, что современные борцы не знают даже имен своих соперников». profc.com.ua ==Death== Shakhov died on 8 August 2018 in Kyiv, Ukraine, aged 86. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet wrestlers Category:People from Saratov Oblast
title: Mikhail Shakhov
